member.name: T:DevExpress.DataAccess.BigQuery.BigQueryCommand
member.summary: A SQL statement to be executed against a BigQuery data source.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the BigQueryCommand class with the specified prototype.
member.param: A BigQueryCommand object to clone.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the BigQueryCommand class with the specified command text and connection settings.
member.param: A System.String values specifying the text of a SQL statement.
A BigQueryConnection object.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the BigQueryCommand class with the specified command text.
member.param: A System.String values specifying the text of a SQL statement.

member.name: M:DevExpress.DataAccess.BigQuery.BigQueryCommand.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the BigQueryCommand class with default settings.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DataAccess.BigQuery.BigQueryCommand.CommandText
member.summary: Specifies the text of a SQL statement to be executed.
member.value: A System.String value specifying the command text.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DataAccess.BigQuery.BigQueryCommand.CommandTimeout
member.summary: Specifies the time before terminating the attempt to execute the command.
member.value: The amount of time in seconds. The default value is 30.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DataAccess.BigQuery.BigQueryCommand.CommandType
member.summary: Specifies how the command should be interpreted.
member.value: A CommandType enumeration value.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DataAccess.BigQuery.BigQueryCommand.UpdatedRowSource
member.summary: Specifies how a query command results are applied to a data row being updated. This implementation always throws NotSupportedException.
member.value: An UpdateRowSource enumeration value.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DataAccess.BigQuery.BigQueryCommand.Connection
member.summary: Specifies the current connection to a BigQuery data source.
member.value: A BigQueryConnection object.

member.name: M:DevExpress.DataAccess.BigQuery.BigQueryCommand.Prepare
member.summary: Creates a prepared (or compiled) version of the command on the data source. This implementation always throws NotSupportedException.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DataAccess.BigQuery.BigQueryCommand.DesignTimeVisible
member.summary: Indicates whether the command object should be visible in a customized interface control.
member.value: true, if the command object should be visible in a control; otherwise false.

member.name: M:DevExpress.DataAccess.BigQuery.BigQueryCommand.ExecuteNonQueryAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously executes a non-query SQL statement. The asynchronous result contains the number of rows affected.
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used to cancel command execution.
member.returns: An asynchronous operation result, containing an Int32 value.

member.name: M:DevExpress.DataAccess.BigQuery.BigQueryCommand.ExecuteNonQuery
member.summary: Executes a non-query SQL statement and returns the number of rows affected.
member.returns: The number of rows affected.

member.name: M:DevExpress.DataAccess.BigQuery.BigQueryCommand.ExecuteScalarAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously executes a SQL statement. The asynchronous result contains the first column of the first row of the resulting data.
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used to cancel command execution.
member.returns: An asynchronous operation result, containing an Object value.

member.name: M:DevExpress.DataAccess.BigQuery.BigQueryCommand.ExecuteScalar
member.summary: Executes a SQL statement and returns the first column of the first row of the resulting data.
member.returns: The first column of the first row of the resulting data.

member.name: M:DevExpress.DataAccess.BigQuery.BigQueryCommand.Cancel
member.summary: Cancels the execution of the current BigQueryCommand.

member.name: T:DevExpress.DataAccess.BigQuery.BigQueryCommandBuilder
member.summary: Automatically generates commands to be executed against a BigQuery data source.

member.name: M:DevExpress.DataAccess.BigQuery.BigQueryCommandBuilder.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the BigQueryCommandBuilder class with default settings.

member.name: M:DevExpress.DataAccess.BigQuery.BigQueryCommandBuilder.#ctor(DevExpress.DataAccess.BigQuery.BigQueryDataAdapter)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the BigQueryCommandBuilder class with the specified data adapter.
member.param: A BigQueryDataAdapter for which to generate commands.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DataAccess.BigQuery.BigQueryCommandBuilder.DataAdapter
member.summary: Specifies a BigQuery data adapter for which commands are generated.
member.value: A BigQueryDataAdapter object.

member.name: M:DevExpress.DataAccess.BigQuery.BigQueryCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand
member.summary: Returns a command that deletes records from a data source.
member.returns: An automatically generated BigQuery command used to delete rows from a BigQuery data table.

member.name: M:DevExpress.DataAccess.BigQuery.BigQueryCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns a command that deletes records from a data source.
member.param: pecifies whether to generate parameter names based on column names.
member.returns: An automatically generated BigQuery command used to delete rows from a BigQuery data table.

member.name: M:DevExpress.DataAccess.BigQuery.BigQueryCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand
member.summary: Returns a command that inserts a record into a data source.
member.returns: An automatically generated BigQuery command used to insert rows into a BigQuery data table.

member.name: M:DevExpress.DataAccess.BigQuery.BigQueryCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns a command that inserts a record into a data source.
member.param: Specifies whether to generate parameter names based on column names.
member.returns: An automatically generated BigQuery command used to delete rows from a BigQuery data table.

member.name: M:DevExpress.DataAccess.BigQuery.BigQueryCommandBuilder.QuoteIdentifier(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a properly quoted analog of the specified quoted identifier.
member.param: a string containing an unquoted identifier.
member.returns: a string containing a properly quoted identifier.

member.name: M:DevExpress.DataAccess.BigQuery.BigQueryCommandBuilder.UnquoteIdentifier(System.String)
member.summary: Returns an unquoted analog of the specified quoted identifier.
member.param: a string containing an unquoted identifier.
member.returns: a string containing an identifier with quotes removed.

member.summary: Opens a data connection.

member.name: T:DevExpress.DataAccess.BigQuery.BigQueryDataAdapter
member.summary: Provides access to data connections and commands used to operate with a BigQuery data source.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the BigQueryDataAdapter class with default settings.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DataAccess.BigQuery.BigQueryDataAdapter.RowUpdating

member.summary: Occurs after a command has been executed against the data source.

member.summary: Specifies a command used to insert rows into a BigQuery data table.

member.summary: Provides data for the RowUpdating event.

The DataTableMapping sent through an Update.

member.summary: Provides data for the RowUpdated event.

member.summary: Gets the nesting depth of the current data row. BigQuery does now support nesting, and this property always returns 0;

The maximum number of bytes to read.
